title: Can't post actual question
content:
Every time I try to post a question, I get a "Failed to post. Content violates Community Policy" error.

This is my question:
My Pixel 3a XL charges very slowly when plugged into my computer's USB-C port, despite displaying "Charging rapidly" on the lock screen. I had no problem charging my Pixel XL 2 this way before trading it in for the 3a XL. Tried changing cables but didn't work, and same cables will charge fast when plugged into wall adapter.
